content:
IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService Interface

Definition

Provides an editing notification interface.

In this Article

public interface IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService

Remarks

To create a new System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid column with special properties, you must first inherit from the DataGridColumnStyle class. The IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService interface is provided to notify the System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid when a column is being edited.

Methods

ColumnStartedEditing(Control)

Informs the DataGrid that the user has begun editing the column.

public void ColumnStartedEditing (System.Windows.Forms.Control editingControl);
Parameters
editingControl
Control

The Control that is editing the column.

Remarks

When called, the ColumnStartedEditing method allows the System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid control to show a pencil in the row header indicating the row is being edited.
